root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 12-5-2, translated into en
root.data: Objective 12. Establish sustainable consumption and production patterns12.5 By 2030, significantly reduce waste generation through prevention, reduction, recycling and reuse12.5.2. An awareness guide is available and at least 1 awareness activity carried out per municipality by 2025Confirmation or invalidation of the Guide in questionno unitThis is the confirmation of the existence of an awareness guide on the fight against climate change.Not available
